trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration settings used to create an event log source on the local computer or a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于在本地计算机或远程计算机上创建的事件日志源的配置设置。

trans-unit.source: Use the EventSourceCreationData class to configure a new source for writing localized entries to an event log.
trans-unit.target: EventSourceCreationData 类用于配置新的源向事件日志写入本地化的项。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to use this class to read from an event log.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用此类从事件日志进行读取。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the configuration settings for a new event source and its associated event log.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义一个新的事件源和其关联的事件日志的配置设置。

trans-unit.source: The associated event log can be on the local computer or a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 相关联的事件日志可以位于本地计算机或远程计算机上。

trans-unit.source: To create a new source for a new or existing event log on the local computer, set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A> properties of an EventSourceCreationData and call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在本地计算机上创建新的源的新的或现有的事件日志，设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A>EventSourceCreationData 和调用属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method creates the event source you specify in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A> property and registers it for the event log specified in <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建在<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A>属性和寄存器在<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>中指定它为事件日志</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A>中指定的事件源

trans-unit.source: This behavior is similar to using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> class to register an event source for an event log.
trans-unit.target: 此行为是类似于使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>类，以注册事件源的事件日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> methods to write events to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法来写入事件，以便将事件日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定事件源写入事件;你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations.
trans-unit.target: 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和它们的配置的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置新的源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建现有的事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的源的新的事件日志时，系统将为该日志，此源注册，但之前向其中写入的第一个条目，将不会创建日志。

trans-unit.source: Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs.
trans-unit.target: 每个源可以仅写入一个事件日志一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might need multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。

trans-unit.source: To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建。

trans-unit.source: If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他应用程序或组件使用的现有源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有的源创建新的源。

trans-unit.source: You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以先使用本地化的资源注册事件源，为你的事件类别和消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序可以写入事件日志项使用资源标识符，而不指定实际的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以注册一个单独的文件的事件类别、 消息和参数插入字符串，或者也可以注册为所有三种类型的字符串的相同资源文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A> properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A>属性，以将源写入本地化的事件日志条目配置为</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值，你不需要设置这些属性。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法直接写入事件日志将写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法来写入事件时使用本地化的消息资源文件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用该<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法使用在事件日志的资源标识符来编写条目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，然后使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData"></xref> class with a specified event source and event log name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData"></xref>具有指定的事件源和事件日志名称的类。

trans-unit.source: To write entries to an event log, you must first create an event source for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 若要将条目写入到事件日志，必须首先创建事件日志的事件源。

trans-unit.source: To register a new source, initialize an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> instance, configure the instance properties for your application, and call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要注册一个新的源，初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>实例时，配置你的应用程序，并调用的实例属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>

trans-unit.source: After the source is registered, you can write entries from the source using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 注册源之后，可以将条目写入从源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以先使用本地化的资源注册事件源，为你的事件类别和消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序可以写入事件日志项使用资源标识符，而不指定实际的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以注册一个单独的文件的事件类别、 消息和参数插入字符串，或者也可以注册为所有三种类型的字符串的相同资源文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A> properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A>属性，以将源写入本地化的事件日志条目配置为</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值，你不需要设置这些属性。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用该<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法使用在事件日志的资源标识符来编写条目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，然后使用该<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法来编写直接向事件日志。 字符串</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>中的源

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>的初始属性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A>|The `source` parameter.| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>|The `logName` parameter.| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MachineName%2A>|The local computer (".").| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>|Zero| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>|`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>|`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A>|`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A>|`source`参数。 | |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>|`logName`参数。 | |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MachineName%2A>|本地计算机 ("。")。 | |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>|零 | |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>|`null` (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>|`null` (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A>|`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).|</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.ParameterResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MachineName%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的事件日志的条目的源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log to which entries from the source are written.
trans-unit.target: 来自源的项将写入日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置类别资源文件中的类别数。

trans-unit.source: Use the CategoryCount and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A> properties to write events with localized category strings.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CategoryCount 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>属性来写入事件时使用本地化的类别字符串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在写入该事件时提供一种类别，事件查看器将显示事件项的类别。

trans-unit.source: Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide further information on the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，用于帮助筛选事件或事件上提供进一步的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可以定义为不同的组件或不同的操作分隔不同类别。

trans-unit.source: Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the CategoryCount and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置 CategoryCount 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The number of categories in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 类别资源文件中的类别的数目。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a negative value or to a value larger than <xref:System.UInt16.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 属性设置为负值或值大于<xref:System.UInt16.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含源的类别字符串的资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A> and CategoryResourceFile properties to write events with localized category strings.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>和 CategoryResourceFile 属性要写入事件的本地化类别字符串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在写入该事件时提供一种类别，事件查看器将显示事件项的类别。

trans-unit.source: Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide further information on the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，用于帮助筛选事件或事件上提供进一步的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可以定义为不同的组件或不同的操作分隔不同类别。

trans-unit.source: Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A> and CategoryResourceFile properties.
trans-unit.target: 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>和 CategoryResourceFile 属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.CategoryCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The path of the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 类别资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the event log to which the source writes entries.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置源将条目写入事件日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be Application, System, or a custom log name.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是应用程序、 系统或自定义日志名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Application."
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"应用程序。"

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which to register the event source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其上注册事件源的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The MachineName value cannot be an empty string.
trans-unit.target: MachineName 值不能为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the machine name is not explicitly set, it defaults to the local computer (".").
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置的计算机名称，则默认为本地计算机 ("。")。

trans-unit.source: When registering a source on a remote computer, you must have administrative rights on that computer to write the registry values with sufficient permissions.
trans-unit.target: 注册时的远程计算机上的源，你必须编写使用具有足够权限的注册表值该计算机上具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: The name of the system on which to register the event source.
trans-unit.target: 在其上注册事件源系统的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer (".").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为本地计算机 ("。")。

trans-unit.source: The computer name is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 计算机名称无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the message resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含消息源的字符串设置格式的消息资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the MessageResourceFile property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages.
trans-unit.target: MessageResourceFile 属性用于配置事件日志源写入本地化的事件消息。

trans-unit.source: Event messages are application-defined strings that describe the event to the user.
trans-unit.target: 事件消息是应用程序定义的字符串，描述向用户事件。

trans-unit.source: Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序可以编写使用资源标识符的事件日志条目。

trans-unit.source: A resource identifier indexes a message located in the MessageResourceFile.
trans-unit.target: 资源标识符索引位于 MessageResourceFile 一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized message resource file based on current language settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的消息资源文件中的相应字符串。

trans-unit.source: The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法写入本地化的项配置了消息资源文件的源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes event message strings directly, rather than using a resource identifier in a localized resource file, do not set the MessageResourceFile property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序写入事件消息字符串直接，而不是在本地化的资源文件中，使用的资源标识符将 MessageResourceFile 属性未设置。

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The path of the message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 消息资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含消息源的参数字符串的资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the ParameterResourceFile property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages with inserted parameter strings.
trans-unit.target: ParameterResourceFile 属性用于配置将使用插入的参数字符串的本地化的事件消息写入事件日志源。

trans-unit.source: Each localized event message specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A> property can contain placeholders for insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 中指定每个本地化的事件消息<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>属性可以包含插入字符串的占位符。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: These placeholders are used to specify the position and resource identifier for a language-independent string within the event message.
trans-unit.target: 这些占位符用于指定的位置和事件消息中的独立于语言的字符串的资源标识符。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer fills in the placeholders using the corresponding strings from the ParameterResourceFile and formats the event log message for the localized event entry.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器使用从 ParameterResourceFile 对应的字符串的占位符填充，并格式化本地化的事件项的事件日志消息。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following section of a message text file defines a string with a parameter placeholder: ``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ``` Within the parameter resource file, the insertion string must be defined with the resource identifier that corresponds to the placeholder, as shown below: ``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ``` The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下部分的消息文本文件定义的参数占位符的字符串︰``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ```在参数资源文件中，插入字符串必须使用定义的资源标识符，对应于占位符，如下所示︰``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ```写入本地化的项或要直接写入字符串，则必须配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法写入本地化的项配置了消息资源文件的源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes event message strings directly to the event log, or if your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A> property does not contain messages with parameter insertion placeholders, do not set the ParameterResourceFile property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将事件消息字符串直接写入事件日志中，或者你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>属性不包含用参数插入占位符的消息，不将 ParameterResourceFile 属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MessageResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The path of the parameter resource file.
trans-unit.target: 参数资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to register with the event log as an event source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要向事件日志添加为事件源注册的名称。

trans-unit.source: The source name is often the name of the application, or the name of a component within a large application.
trans-unit.target: 源名称通常是应用程序的名称或大型应用程序内的一个组件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName> method uses the Source, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MachineName%2A> properties to create registry values on the target computer for the new source and its associated event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法使用源， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MachineName%2A>属性，以创建新的源和其关联的事件日志。 在目标计算机上的注册表值</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.MachineName%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData.LogName%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%28System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name on the target computer.
trans-unit.target: 新的源名称不能与现有源名称或目标计算机上的现有事件日志名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: After the registry values for the source are created, your application can use the source to write entries to the configured event log.
trans-unit.target: 创建源的注册表值后，你的应用程序可用于源将条目写入到配置的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs.
trans-unit.target: 每个源可以仅写入一个事件日志一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。

trans-unit.source: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的事件日志的条目的源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。
